name: Dance-Off Stage: "Revelrous Rhythm"
description: A finely engineered metal performance stage, this faithful replica of the Dance-Off Stage is a masterwork of phlogiston engineering and its surrounding scenery. According to the staff, this stage integrates multiple functions: from rhythm modulation and stage effect coordination to specialized lighting control. Of course, operating and maintaining such a marvel requires rigorous training... But tonight, on this summer eve of music and movement, let us set aside all complexities and simply dance with abandon beneath its dazzling lights!
